summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 188 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 906 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 188.3m lower than yesterday, 29.0m lower than the past week, 905.7m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 745m minimum and 3580m maximum, with an average of 1798.1m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1827.1m and 2700m.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Some rain can be expected, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. Weather could become unsettled.
